Olivier Harouna Bonnes (amụrụ na 7 Febụwarị 1990) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere etiti maka Nonthaburi United
A mụrụ ya na Niamey, Bonnes agbaala bọọlụ na France na Belgium maka Nantes B, Nantes, Lille B na Brussels.
Na 24 Septemba 2014, Bonnes bịanyere aka na klọb ndị Bulgaria bụ Vereya. Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ na Bulgaria maka Lokomotiv Plovdiv na Montana.
Na 25 Julaị 2016, Bonnes bịanyere aka na klọb South Korea Gwangju FC.
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018, Bonnes bịanyere aka na klọb South Korea Seongnam FC.
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2019 ọ kwagara na klọb Uzbek bụ Kokand 1912.
Bonnes mere nke mbụ ya na mba Niger n'afọ 2011, na-enweta ngụkọta nke 9 caps na ha n'etiti afọ 2011 na 2012, gụnyere otu ngosi na egwuregwu FIFA World Cup
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na 2012 Africa Cup of Nations
